ygData.subject: Re: Public challenge.
ygData.msgSnippet: A time and date should be set so all the RPGers can join and watch. Also, this shouldn t be a fight to the death, but a fight to the finish.  When one player

A time and date should be set so all the RPGers can join and watch.  
Also, this shouldn't be a fight to the death, but a fight to the 
finish.  When one player is down and goes into stasis lock, the the 
one standing is the winner.  This way the characters can still be 
played or else someone looses a charater.
This is only my humble opinion.
